projectGridLines.title: Title: Enhancing Manufacturing Quality with Cutting-Edge Computer Vision Technology
projectGridLines.description:
Description: A technology solution that helps automotive parts manufacturers improve the visual inspection process by using computer vision. The solution will use deep learning based image comparison techniques to identify defective parts. It’s all about making quality checks faster, more accurate, and less reliant on manual work.

Skill sets: Python, machine learning, deep learning, OpenCV, GenAI

Traits expectation: Self driven, creativity, persistence

Expected learning: Hands on knowledge of above technologies, gen AI technologies, Startup experience

projectGridLines.title: Dynamic end to end Software Solution for Streamlined Production Planning and Optimization
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Start building a brand-new software product from scratch using full-stack technologies. Along the way, learn how to use generative AI to make the development process faster and more creative. It’s a chance to take an idea and turn it into something real and impactful while exploring exciting new tools and approaches.

Skill sets: Backend Development, Gen AI

Traits expectation: Self driven, creativity, persistence

Expected learning: Hands on knowledge. Ownership of work, planning and executing.
